metadata.description: Professional development tools and plugins by Narcoleptic Fox

plugins.name: shadcn-aesthetic
plugins.description: Modern CSS/SCSS architecture based on shadcn/ui design principles for refined, accessible styling

plugins.name: crisp-architecture
plugins.description: CRISP Architecture Suite - Clean, Reusable, Isolated, Simple, Pragmatic scaffolding patterns for modern applications

plugins.name: dotnet-enterprise
plugins.description: Enterprise .NET Patterns - ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, security best practices for .NET 8, 9, and 10

plugins.name: rust-performance
plugins.description: Rust Performance Toolkit - Best practices, async patterns, zero-cost abstractions, and performance optimization

plugins.name: cross-stack-microservices
plugins.description: Cross-Stack Microservices - Production-ready templates and patterns for Go, .NET, and Rust microservices

plugins.name: modern-frontend
plugins.description: Modern Frontend - Vue 3 Composition API, React hooks, TypeScript patterns, and state management

plugins.name: defense-security
plugins.description: Defense-Grade Security - NIST compliance, security controls, cryptography, and secure development practices

plugins.name: novelcrafter-export
plugins.description: Novelcrafter Export - Tools for exporting, formatting, and converting Novelcrafter content to various publication formats
